title: Troll mother

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Troll mother is the mother of the troll child near the Ice Gate north of Trollheim. She, along with her husband, were captured and frozen by Kamil. Dialogue with the troll father suggests he had found the Ice diamond, not knowing what it was and planned to return it to its owner. However, when they attempted to, Kamil thought that they had stolen it from him and froze the two as punishment. She is freed along with her husband after their son told the adventurer that they had the diamond. After the quest, she can be found near the Ice Gate, along with her husband and son.

The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Troll mother
Troll mother
Released18 April 2005 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceTroll
LocationIce Path
QuestDesert Treasure

OptionsTalk-to
ExamineAn ice troll.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID709

The Troll mother is the mother of the troll child near the Ice Gate north of Trollheim. She, along with her husband, were captured and frozen by Kamil. Dialogue with the troll father suggests he had found the Ice diamond, not knowing what it was and planned to return it to its owner. However, when they attempted to, Kamil thought that they had stolen it from him and froze the two as punishment. She is freed along with her husband after their son told the adventurer that they had the diamond. After the quest, she can be found near the Ice Gate, along with her husband and son.

Like her husband, the troll mother speaks perfect English, unlike other trolls.

[[File:Ice troll chathead.png|left]]
The '''Troll mother''' is the mother of the [[troll child]] near the Ice Gate north of [[Trollheim]]. She, along with her [[troll father|husband]], were captured and frozen by [[Kamil]]. Dialogue with the troll father suggests he had found the [[Ice diamond]], not knowing what it was and planned to return it to its owner. However, when they attempted to, Kamil thought that they had stolen it from him and froze the two as punishment. She is freed along with her husband after their son told the adventurer that they had the diamond. After the quest, she can be found near the Ice Gate, along with her husband and son.

Like her husband, the troll mother speaks perfect English, unlike other trolls.
